item.description: Hugging Face A token is not necessary, it allow you to have a bigger rate limit Create an account on HuggingFace Follow the documentation for getting an user access token Use the generated token in the API key entry Go Home File an issue
OpenAI The OpenAI API uses API keys for authentication. Visit your API Keys page to retrieve the API key you’ll use in your requests. Go Home File an issue

Installation Flatpak Flathub You can either use your GNOME Software and search for “Bavarder” or you can run flatpak install io.github.Bavarder.Bavarder From Source Clone the repo and run flatpak-builder git clone https://codeberg.org/Bavarder/Bavarder.git # or https://github.com/Bavarder/Bavarder.git cd Bavarder flatpak-builder --install --user --force-clean repo/ build-aux/flatpak/io.github.Bavarder.Bavarder.json Archlinux Bavarder is available in the AUR. Just use your favourite aur helper! yay -S bavarder NixOS Bavarder is available in Nixpkgs Unstable. nix-shell -p bavarder Go Home File an issue
